welcome_message_body: Welcome to beautiful Le Plessis-Trevise! Known for its charming streets and proximity to Paris, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's unique culture and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly serving low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed or data usage.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, with multiple sub-terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection after a certain period of time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
